subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Deaths (Fatalities)
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: A former N.B.A. referee shot and killed himself in a suburban New Orleans hotel room on the same day his wife was found strangled at their Houston area home, the authorities said.
snippet: A former N.B.A. referee shot and killed himself in a suburban New Orleans hotel room on the same day his wife was found strangled at their Houston area home, the authorities said.
